name: Yumemiru Sepia
description:
Summary

Pia adores Wither and Wither adores Pia. The two cherish their time together alone, spent on playdates at the park. 

It's simple, easygoing - a pleasurable time that they indulge in for as long as the day allows. Pia is allowed to let loose and howl to their heart's content. Yume enjoys Pia's song immersed within nature's own orchestra. Life is lovely... But Pia notices that Yume is troubled. 

Can these gentle moments last?

________________

Made for o2a2 Visual Novel Jam 2022.

Scenario - rainarium

Sprite - rainarium

_______________

1 sprite

1 background

1 song

1 sound effect

1 ending

1 dev

945 words

I was super unprepared and almost gave up near the end. But I think finishing something is the most important part so I went through with it. It ended up as a good learning experience at least.

______________

Special thanks to:

Tofurocks for the GUI template.

(I didn't get to tweak the accessibility settings properly, so I disabled some of them, sorry!)

Ann Annie for the song used.

VimislikArt for all of his RenPy tutorials

Pexels.com for the background

O2A2 2022 Art and Logo used in Splash Screen
